3042.name: Isle of Colonsay Brewing Company
3042.description: Started brewing in March 2007, using a five barrel plant.  Three core beers are brewed - Colonsay Lager (4.4 %), Colonsay 80/- Ale (4.2%), and Colonsay IPA (3.9%).  Beers are available in bottles only.

origin.placename: Colonsay, Argyll and Bute PA61 7, UK
origin.name: origin
